name: Dark Quest (itch) (NeoRain314)
description:
I programmed this as a present for the 11th birthday of my sister using ct.js.

Controls

Move around with WASD or a gamepad. To interact with things press E.

Don't move into Enemies! If you found a sword you can use this with Shift. Running in Enemies while using your sword will damage or kill them.

To change to the next szene or start the game klick anywhere with your mouse, press space or press any button on your controler.
